code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with Kidney for 10 days. she is a 45 yr old white female. denies any alcohol use she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 67 in, Weight 98 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.
